Senior Centre

Kingsclear First Nation, NB
E3E 1J3

Administration Hours

Monday - Tuesday: 9:00AM - 3:00PM

Saturday - Sunday: Closed

Visiting Hours

Every day:
9:00AM - 12:00PM

General Information and Services

The Senior Centre is a community residence that has been operating since December 2010. The 8 room/10 bed facility is Provincially inspected annually. Services include:

  • 24 hour care & assistance
  • Administering of medications
  • Provision of meals and lodging
